TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AesManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Aes
Public NotInheritable Class AesManaged Inherits Aes
public ref class AesManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Aes

summary.span: 提供高级加密标准 (AES) 对称算法的托管实现。

span.span: Provides a managed implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks AES 算法本质上是 Rijndael 对称算法，具有固定的块大小和迭代计数。The AES algorithm is essentially the Rijndael symmetric algorithm with a fixed block size and iteration count. 此类的工作方式与 类相同，但将块限制为128位，不允许反馈模式。This class functions the same way as the class but limits blocks to 128 bits and does not allow feedback modes. > [!NOTE] > 如果启用了针对符合美国联邦信息处理标准（FIPS）的算法的 Windows 安全策略设置，则使用此算法将引发 。If the Windows security policy setting for Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS)-compliant algorithms is enabled, using this algorithm throws a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类对示例数据进行加密和解密。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the class. [!code-csharp[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/vb/program.vb#1)] [!code-fsharp[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/fs/program.fs#1)]

span.span: The Windows security policy setting for FIPS is enabled.

exception.span: 此实现不是 Windows 平台 FIPS 验证的加密算法的一部分。

span.span: This implementation is not part of the Windows Platform FIPS-validated cryptographic algorithms.

span.span: The block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The default is 128 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 AES，唯一有效的块大小为128位。For AES, the only valid block size is 128 bits. 有关块大小的详细信息，请参阅 。See the for more information about block size.

summary.span: 获取或设置用作反馈的位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of bits to use as feedback.
The feedback size, in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最大反馈大小为128位。The maximum feedback size is 128 bits. > [!NOTE] > 由于此算法不支持反馈模式，因此不建议使用此属性。Because this algorithm does not support feedback modes, using this property is discouraged.
